com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.did

Class HcsDid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.did.HcsDid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HederaDid

    public class HcsDid
extends java.lang.Object
implements HederaDid
    Hedera Decentralized Identifier for Hedera DID Method specification based on HCS.

        public static java.lang.String publicKeyToIdString(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.crypto.ed25519.Ed25519PublicKey didRootKey)
        Constructs an id-string of a DID from a given public key.
        Parameters:
        didRootKey - Public Key from which the DID is created.
        Returns:
        The id-string of a DID that is a Base58-encoded SHA-256 hash of a given public key.

        The private key of DID root key.
